title: Interpretation of a dream about defecating and urinating in front of people

preview.html: Interpretation of defecation, defecation and defecation in a dream for a single girl, for a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, for a man, if I dream that I am urinating in a public place on the street, at home at school or at work by Ibn Sirin and more. Feces in a dream are among the relatively disappointing dreams that we see in Our dreams cause us a lot of anxiety and confusion to get the correct interpretation of the vision, as the process of defecation is one of the things we do in public life. To remove the leftovers of food present in our bodies, to obtain complete health, but if you see it in a dream, it carries many different meanings and connotations that the dreamer must be aware of.Interpretation of performing a need in front of people in a dreamInterpretation of dreams inventing an event in a place in a dream about the phenomena And whoever sees that he is creating an event in a place, he will spend his money on his desire. When he excretes feces in a dream, this indicates that she will be freed from worries and constant thinking, and that she will soon marry a person with good morals and that will make her happy. Seeing the dreamer excreting his feces in front of everyone in a dream It means that he will soon obtain a source of livelihood, but in the case of an unmarried person defecating in front of everyone in a dream, it is evidence of marriage in the near future. Interpretation of feces in a dream Feces in a dream is one of the dreams that brought us many happy and joyful connotations that the dreamer will acquire in the near future It is also one of the dreams that indicate that the dreamer will be freed from pain and illness and will have a new life free of problems or diseases. As the dream indicates to the debtor, he will get rid of debts and obtain money. Seeing a sick person defecating in a dream means that he will get rid of illness and obtain complete health. Interpretation of seeing feces in a dream for a single woman: An unmarried woman appearing in a dream, and seeing feces coming out of her, is evidence that she will soon get rid of her troubles and gain happiness and goodness in the coming days. Seeing feces in a dream for an unmarried woman is evidence that she is carrying pressure and thinking a lot about marriage and happiness, Where she always thinks about marrying her lover or a good person who will make her happy in life. Interpretation of seeing feces in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees that she is wet and comfortable after relieving herself in a dream, this is evidence that she will be able to get rid of her worries in the near future and will feel happy, The dream also indicates that she will have lost marital happiness between her and her husband. Seeing a married woman suffering from problems, worries, and heart pains emerging in a dream is evidence that she will be freed from all her problems, and it also indicates a new beginning.

title: Correct indications of seeing yourself putting out a fire in a dream

preview.html: Extinguishing a fire in a dream: Although fire represents to us in reality the forces of evil or destruction, it caused a great revolution when it was discovered because of its various benefits from cooking and heating, and many commercial and industrial uses. For this reason, extinguishing a fire in a dream means eliminating evil, but It can mean getting rid of one of the means of salvation, as the difference in details changes the interpretation of the dream, so we have collected all interpretations of the vision for you. Of fire in this article. What is the interpretation of seeing yourself extinguishing a fire in a dream? Fire in real life is considered one of the most famous forces that destroy everything that comes in its way and turns it into ashes in moments, so extinguishing it in a dream is a victory over the power of evil. Just as Burning flames suggest intense anger for us. Seeing them extinguished means appeasement of anger and the return of good relations. It is said that it represents torment in the afterlife, so extinguishing it means religiosity, abandoning bad deeds, and repenting to the Creator for committing sins. But a very burning fire indicates a great power. It has a great influence, but it is unfair, so its extinction expresses the elimination of the corrupt king’s rule. In the story of Abel and Cain, the sign of the Lord’s acceptance of the sacrifice was its burning in fire, so the fire may indicate the Lord’s acceptance of the servant’s repentance and supply of good things, and in it He extinguishes it. Returning to the path of error again. It is also a warning message to the dreamer to stay away from bad company that incites him to commit sins and not observe morals and customs. It also indicates a person who does not develop himself and his skills, as he cannot keep up with the era in which he lives, as he cannot achieve superiority over others. His colleagues. Extinguishing a fire in a dream by Ibn Sirin believes that fire is often a product of man, because it often expresses the evils committed by the sons of Adam, so extinguishing it means accepting his repentance. Interpretation of dreams of extinguishing fire by Ibn Sirin also expresses salvation from powerful evil forces that were It is trying to cause serious harm to the dreamer. It also expresses the strength of the dreamer’s piety in the face of life’s temptations and temptations, which will be a reason for his Lord’s satisfaction with him (God willing). It also says that it indicates that there are many changes that the dreamer’s life will go through, but he will fight them in every way. To return to its original state. What is the interpretation of a dream about putting out a fire for a single woman? Fighting fires is a dream for singles. Extinguishing a fire in a dream for a single woman basically expresses the strength of her personality and her ability to solve her problems on her own without anyone’s help, as she loves to rely on herself a lot. Also, the fire indicates many Of the events and problems that she has recently experienced, while extinguishing them indicates that she will be able to restore peace and stability to her life again. If she sees someone extinguishing the fire and saving her from danger, this is a sign that she will marry someone who loves her very much and cares for her. But sometimes it indicates A stereotypical or traditional personality who does not like change or doing new things and adventures in her life because

title: Lice in a dream on my son’s head, according to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing lice in my young son’s hair and interpretation of seeing lice in my son’s hair and killing him.

preview.html:
Lice in a dream on my son’s headLice is considered a harmful, blood-sucking insect that appears on the scalp and causes severe itching in humans. A person may see in a dream the presence of these lice on the head of a son or daughter, so what are the interpretations? See lice in a dream on my son's head? We focus on this throughout our article. Lice in a dream on my son’s head by Ibn Sirin. Lice in a dream on my son’s head. There are disturbing signs surrounding the interpretation of lice in a dream on my son’s head and they may portend the academic failure that this child will be exposed to during his year and the serious psychological effects that will befall him as a result. Therefore, seeing lice in the son’s hair can be considered an indication that he may be suffering from some diseases, and therefore he must take good care of his health and advise him about his personal hygiene so that he does not suffer harm in the coming days. There will be some serious influences from some friends on the son, and this happens if someone sees His parents have lice in his hair, as he will be exposed to great sadness because of his colleagues, so he must be protected from this danger. As for the dreamer himself, seeing these insects in his son’s hair is evidence of the damage he has suffered in life as a result of the daily conflicts that are often repeated in his work. And he loses focus.
ZOE. The sleeper would like to witness killing the lice in his son’s hair and getting rid of them, or using some materials that eliminate them. The dream at that time is evidence of this son’s success and getting out of any problem. Which plagued his life. Lice in a dream on my son’s head by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explains that lice in a dream inside a son’s head have connotations that differ between good and evil, and if there are a lot of them in the hair, this indicates the man’s new job and the realization of a large part of him. Ambitions. As for the son himself, it may be a clear warning from corrupt companions who plan to influence the details of his life in an undesirable way, and there are mistakes that he is likely to commit because of them. As for the mother’s attempt to rid her son of the lice in his hair and remove them, this expresses the psychological support that she provides. For the child and her attempt to change his life and behavior for the better, which means that it contributes to his happiness and well-being. Do not put pressure on him. There are good meanings associated with killing the lice on the child’s head, as the subject illustrates the earnest effort of the visionary to provide comfort and success for his son, and with the fact that this child is sick to his father. He quickly gives healing with his mercy and grace. An Egyptian website, the largest website specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. All you have to do is write the Egyptian dream interpretation website on Google and get the correct interpretations. Lice in a dream on my son’s head about a married woman. Lice is considered one of the undesirable signs in Interpretation of seeing it in the son’s hair for a married woman: it indicates many disagreements and judgments between the woman herself and the husband. It is likely that the woman will face a major crisis in her son’s life if she finds a large louse on his head and he feels sorry for the pain he causes, but if he kills him, the problem will be solved. And the child will achieve. You will be happy

title: Everything you are looking for is the interpretation of a dream about honey in a dream for a married woman, black honey in a dream for a married woman, and the interpretation of a dream about selling honey for a married woman and buying honey in a dream for married people. Women

preview.html: What did the jurists say about the interpretation of a dream about honey in a married woman’s dream? A married woman may see honey in her dream and search for a clear interpretation of it. She may eat it with her husband or share it or perhaps sell it in her dream, and because honey is one of the many symbols because it contains more. From one color, we decided on the specialized Egyptian website to convey in detail what the jurists said about it. Read the contents of the article. Interpretation of a dream about honey for a married woman. Honey in a dream for a married woman indicates a livelihood full of comfort and material, moral, and marital security. If she takes a quantity of honey in a dream and gives it to her children to enjoy its sweet taste, then she is taking care of them, improving their upbringing, and teaching them the content and morals of the precious religion. Others must understand it and deal with it through it. Ibn Sirin said: Whoever gives honey to others to eat from it is a lover of the Qur’an and its reading, and therefore if a married woman gives honey to her children, she is teaching them the correct ways. To read and recite the Qur’an. As long as the honey in the dream is pure, this reflects the purity of the dreamer’s heart, as she gives and does not throw away whoever wants to help her, but rather gives him a lot to feel content and happy. If her husband is in debt and carries sadness and slander in his heart and you see him carrying a lot of honey in his hand, he will find kindness Everywhere, money may come to him because of a profession related to education or imparting knowledge to others. Because seeing honey on the hand means increasing knowledge. If a married woman is pregnant and sees white honey in her dream, then God will give her a beautiful child. White honey for married and pregnant women indicates that the mind and heart are free of evil thoughts and are only occupied with what is useful, and since seeing means thinking Positive and beneficial, success will be written for the dreamer and for everyone who ate honey with her in a dream. When a married woman dreams that her husband gives her a spoonful of white honey, this is pregnancy, and if the two sides sit eating delicious honey until the end of the dream, they will feel harmony in their life together and will be blessed with love twice. As it was before. But if she sees her husband taking honey in front of her and giving it to another woman and sitting down to eat with her, then this indicates aversion and reluctance on the part of the husband to continue his life with the dreamer, and he will do so. Marrying another woman, he feels the same feelings with her that he experienced with the dreamer because he made her eat from the same dish in the dream. If the dreamer sees two bowls of honey, the first with impurities and the other pure, he eats from the second and leaves the first; Because he loves God and His Messenger, and chooses lawful work to obtain good food. And if her husband eats with her, they will walk on the straight path, which is the path of faith in God. If the amount of honey is unusually high in her dream, this is wealth that she will achieve in the future from her lawful money. If the dreamer sees that honey is added to water, i.e. adulterated, then he may be prevented from Performing his job or achieving his various interests in life. If she sees someone giving her adulterated honey, then she hates it and is a hypocrite, and God has warned her in this dream to protect herself from harming him and stay away from him. Interpretation of a dream about honey for a woman

Interpretation of a dream about honey for a woman

title: Signs of witchcraft in a dream: Dreams that show envy and the evil eye

preview.html: Symbols indicating touch and symbols indicating the exit of magic from the body and healing, whether burying black magic or drinking Ibn Sirin. A recurring dream of someone who sees predatory animals such as lions, tigers, wild dogs, etc. Of predatory animals, the monarch attacks, frightening a person and his intense fear of them, and also seeing monkeys in a dream symbolizes spiritual illness and is indicated by touching the jinn or jinn. Seeing camels, or as he calls them camels, was repeated, based on the hadith of the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace: “No You pray in camel houses, because it is their creation. Jinn. They do not see their eyes and their condition if they apostatize, and they pray in sheepfolds, because they are closer to the Most Merciful.” Seeing a black snake repeatedly in a dream symbolizes magic and touch, especially seeing a person in his dream as if there was a black snake touching his leg and wrapping it around him or wrapping around the body of the dreamer. Seeing a black snake of Far in a dream means that the spiritual seer (jinn) is about to touch the fortuneteller, and the large size symbolizes his rank. Seeing cats and dogs repeatedly also symbolizes male jinn, referring to males and vice versa, especially black dogs and cats. Recurring seeing a hedgehog which symbolizes The jinn who lives with people in his house or lives in empty, desolate places frequently sees owls and bats, which is a type of touch and flight magic, and his vision shows that he was attacked by the seer, and therefore he prepared to harm the seer while he was harming him. The frequent sighting of a donkey and a pig symbolizes the Jewish and Christian jinn Also, the frequent sighting of insects, especially cockroaches, indicates the weakness of the jinn inhabiting the house. Seeing flying in a dream and falling from high places symbolizes flying jinn. Seeing intercourse and everything related to marital matters between spouses indicates the presence of jinn in love. Seeing many houses and graves Empty and abandoned indicates magic and extreme sorcery and seeing black men or women. Seeing a person in his dream with a swollen face indicates people’s hatred and envy towards him and increased backbiting and gossip against him. Toxins, impurities of any kind, and whoever sees that he is eating worms envies cruelty in food and living, a dog and a pig, a necklace, seeing the birth of male twins. And females together means that she will live a life full of luxury and happiness, but there will be people around her who envy her and hate her and will try to sabotage her happiness. Whoever dreams that he has a lit candle in his hand and someone extinguished it, this indicates someone who is jealous of the blessing within him. Ghosts entering homes or corpses. Snakes and scorpions. Cockroaches in a pregnant woman’s dream. It means envy of those around her, and whoever dreams that flies are biting his body, this indicates the envy of a group of inferior people who are jealous of his family and relatives. Whoever sees lice coming out of his hair shows the appearance of envy. Some well-known places and names in magic, such as the Pharaohs, Babylon, Harut, and Marut, if they have nothing to do with them, and I assure you that the symbols alone Its presence in the dream is not sufficient, and the presence of the rest of the symbols determines its interpretation. Dreaming of Noah, peace be upon him, in a dream means that he is a person who has enemies and neighbors who are jealous of him, and he flees from them, and takes revenge.

title: Interpretation of a dream about swallowing snake venom in a dream

title: Interpretation of a dream about a cat attacking me for a married woman

preview.html: Through our distinguished Mufsir website, we will provide you with everything related to seeing a cat, and you will learn more about this vision in the following lines. Interpretation of a dream about a cat attacking me in a dream about a single girl. If a single girl sees that there is a cat attacking her in a dream. This vision indicates some fluctuations that occur In her life. Whereas if she sees that there is a cat attacking her, and some traces of wounds on her face in a dream. This vision indicates sadness in some matters related to her waking life, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. But if a single girl sees a cat attacking her in a dream. This vision may indicate... An unfaithful friend or an unkind friend, and God knows best. When an unmarried girl dreams that a cat is chasing her, this vision may indicate a bad friend living in her life, and God knows best. Some dream interpreters believe that seeing a cat in a dream for one girl. It indicates a bad friend and could That indicates negative things. See also: Interpretation of seeing cats in a dream in detail. Interpretation of a dream about a cat attacking me in a dream about a married woman. Seeing a cat attacking a married woman in a dream indicates the presence of a malicious woman in the dreamer’s life. Whereas seeing many cats in a married woman’s dream It indicates the deception of some people. But if he sees a married woman, there are a lot of male cats in the dream. The dream may indicate the deceit of very close people. Or if he sees a married woman, then there are a lot of female cats in the dream. The vision shows a good omen with help. God Almighty. And if a married woman dreams of a cat attacking her inside the house. The vision indicates the hypocrisy of some people, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. And if a married woman sees that there are many cats scratching her in a dream. It may indicate simple marital problems that can be overcome, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about a cat You attack me in a dream about a man and its meaning. If a married man sees that there is a cat attacking him in a dream, this may indicate kindness and good humanity. Whereas if a married man sees that there are a lot of female cats in a dream, then he attacks him in the dream. This vision may indicate love for a woman. Exciting for the dreamer. Or if a married man sees that a cat is attacking him, and he is hungry in the dream. This vision indicates poverty in some matters related to the life of the visionary, and God knows best. Whereas if a married man sees that there are male cats attacking him in the dream, the vision may indicate thieves or They are swindlers, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. And when you see a meek and quiet cat in a dream, the vision may indicate goodness and benefit for the owner of the vision. Whereas if a married man sees in a dream that there are small cats, then the vision shows children or people in his house. Read also: Interpretation of a dream A cat attacks me and bites me. The meaning of seeing a dream of a cat attacking me in a dream and a pregnant woman and its interpretation. Seeing a cat attacking me in a dream translates into many variations of a pregnant woman’s dream, such as: If a pregnant woman sees that there are a lot of males, she attacks them in a dream. This vision indicates minor health problems. And God knows best. Whereas if a pregnant woman sees that there is a lot of...

title: Interpretation of tomato paste in a dream: Seeing tomato juice in a dream

preview.html: Seeing tomato paste or tomatoes, whether it is in the afternoon to buy cooking, and prepare sauce for single women, married women, pregnant women, and more, by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq. Interpretation of tomato paste in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin says that seeing tomatoes in a dream indicates passion and love. Intense and indicative of success and excellence, while seeing tomato paste means facilitating things and opening the doors of kindness. The scholar Ibn Sirin says that seeing tomato paste in a dream indicates the fulfillment of many desires, goals and aspirations that the dreamer wants. Interpretation of tomatoes in a dream Al-Nabulsi Al-Nabulsi says that seeing tomatoes in a dream It means happiness, good news, good events, good health, activity and strength, and this is what characterizes the dreamer with joy, activity and vitality, and this is what makes him very popular among people. Interpretation of buying tomato paste in a dream When a person sees in his dream that he is buying tomatoes, the vision may indicate It indicates comfort and happiness after extreme exhaustion, and it may indicate safety and security after intense fear, and it may indicate overcoming crises and overcoming difficulties. While seeing tomato paste indicates a very good and plentiful diet and a lot of money that the dreamer will get, while seeing buying rotten tomato pulp indicates Or rotten, indicates that there are many differences, fears, and problems that the dreamer suffers from a lot. Interpretation of tomatoes in a dream for a married woman: A married woman who sees tomato paste or tomatoes in a dream, the vision may indicate good health and indicate protection, stability, and a happy life full of happiness and love with her husband and family. . Difficulties and lack of fatigue, and it shows her marital happiness and psychological comfort. Interpretation of red sauce in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees red sauce in a dream, this may indicate the fulfillment of many desires, excellence, and success in her studies, while buying red sauce indicates good conditions and ease of dealing. Interpretation of tomato juice in a dream: If one sees cooked and raw tomatoes in his dream, this may indicate his freedom from worries, obstacles and problems and the improvement of circumstances for the better, while seeing tomatoes means satisfying desires, many goods and nutrition, and a lot of money. Watching The Tomato Box with Sheikh Saleh Al Majid.

title: Slaughtering a cow in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about slaughtering a cow in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl gets engaged and sees a slaughtered cow in her dream, this means that she does not understand her fiancé and there are many problems between them. When an unmarried girl sees a strong cow in a dream, this is evidence of an abundance of goodness and also indicates that she will marry someone He has good qualities. But if an unmarried girl sees herself in a dream slaughtering a cow, this is evidence of gossip. Slaughtering a cow in a dream for a single girl indicates happiness and kindness, and if the size of the cow is evidence of great happiness. Slaughtering a cow in a dream for a single girl It indicates the repayment of all her debts. When an unmarried girl sees a slaughtered cow in her dream, this indicates the beginning of a new life. Interpretation of seeing a cow slaughtered in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees a slaughtered cow in a dream, this means that her married life is stable and she will live happily with her husband. When a married woman dreams that her husband is slaughtering a cow, this is evidence of the abundance of wealth that will come to her home. If a married woman sees a slaughtered cow in a dream and her children are suffering from an illness, then this dream indicates recovery. But if a married woman sees cow’s milk in a dream, this It indicates the abundance of sustenance, and it also indicates the end of all the problems that she was suffering from. Read also: Escaping from a cow into a dreamInterpretation of a dream about slaughtering a cow in a dream about a pregnant womanSlaughtering a cow in a dream for a pregnant woman is considered a good dream, but many believe that it is a bad dream, but This dream does not portend danger. If a pregnant woman sees a slaughtered cow in a dream, this is evidence that her birth will be easy and the child will be healthy. If a pregnant woman sees a healthy cow in a dream and eats the herbs found on the ground, this means that her birth will be easy. When she sees If a pregnant woman sees a pale cow, this indicates that she will give birth to a beautiful girl. However, if she sees a cow in a dream whose body is dark, this indicates that she will give birth to a boy. If she sees two cows in her dream, the color of their bodies is light, then this is evidence that she will give birth to two girls. If a cow sees that Her body is black, and she sees another cow whose body is light, then this is evidence that she will give birth to a boy and a girl. Interpretation of seeing a cow being slaughtered in a dream for a man: A man who sees a cow being slaughtered in a dream is very worried and wants to interpret this dream, but this dream for a man shows food and happiness, and among these interpretations: If he sees A slaughtered cow in a dream. This is evidence that he will meet a rich girl and enter his life, and he will live a happy life. If one sees a cow being slaughtered in a dream, he will suffer from financial problems. This indicates the end of all problems and he will have a lot of money. When a man sees in his dream A slaughtered cow, and its blood spills on the ground, this indicates the end of sadness and anxiety, and his life will change for the better. You may be interested: Interpretation of a dream of a raging cow that wants to be the butt of a married and single woman. Interpretation of a dream of slaughtering a cow in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that slaughtering a cow in a dream is for him Multiple interpretations. One of the most important interpretations of Ibn
